::RebelYell::
RebelYell looked around him. He saw the fallen
maximals and the crumbling Ark. He knew there was no
chance. Then he saw a bot doing nothing(Oinker). Well,
he thought, if he was going to die he was going to
send at least one of these pieces of slag to the pit
first. He charged at the bot, firing 25 rounds at him
with the chain gun.
